title: RHUGT: Mind Your Manors
description:
The Real Housewives Ultimate Girls Trip is back - as are eight ex-Housewives, who Peacock has shoved into Bluestone Manor as part of some sadistic social experiment. We couldn't be happier.

This is Crappens on Demand! Watch our recap here: https://www.patreon.com/posts/68223835
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
